text: - My name is Bianca WÃ¶ltje.

I'm an EMEA Greenfield
Business Development Manager,

and I'm with AWS for
three and a half years.

So the EMEA Greenfield
Business Development Team
is working with the local sales team
in order to provide a great experience

to our Greenfield customers,
which are the customers

in their early stage of
adoption of AWS Cloud.
Looking at AWS from the outside,

it seems to be a very,
very big corporation
with the headquarter in the US.
And you wouldn't necessarily think

about a fast-moving
startup-like environment.

But I think what we in
AWS do very, very well
is just having like a day one mindset.

We always talk about it being
day one and not day two.
So we are always challenging ourselves,

we are always thinking
about what we can improve.
We have several mechanisms in place
in order to reinvent ourselves,
and I think that is something very nice
that brings us close to our customers,

that helps us to connect
with the local communities,
with the local customer.
It's such an inspiring work environment.
There's like so many people around you,

you could ask for advice
that could help you

develop new ideas that are
great sparring partners,
and I think that's something that really

like, motivates me to
come to work every day.
